laboratory_examinations.findings: Values between 7.5–8% at diagnosis of diabetes; between 7.1–7.3% during the previous year.
High fibrinogen levels (612 mg/dL), normal prothrombin, APTT, antithrombin III, and protein S.
Low activity of protein C (60% vs. 98615%), reverted to normal after a year.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Improved to normal after a year.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Homocysteine concentration in the normal range.
